00065 /*  Definition of complex data types */
00066  
00067 #ifndef  _CMPLX
00068 #define  _CMPLX 1
00069 #ifndef  _REIM
00070 #define _REIM   1
00071 #endif
00072 typedef union { struct { float  __re, __im; } __data; double __align; }  cmplx;
00073 #endif
00074  
00075 #ifndef  _DCMPLX
00076 #define  _DCMPLX 1
00077 #ifndef  _REIM
00078 #define _REIM   1
00079 #endif
00080 typedef union { struct { double __re, __im; } __data; double __align; } dcmplx;
00081 #endif
00082  
00083 #ifdef  _REIM
00084 #define RE(x)   ((x).__data.__re)
00085 #define IM(x)   ((x).__data.__im)
00086 #endif

03787 /*  Definition of complex data types */
03788  
03789 #ifndef  _CMPLX
03790 #define  _CMPLX 1
03791 class cmplx
03792   {
03793    private:
03794      union { struct { float  _re,_im; } _data; double _esvalign;};
03795    public:
03796       cmplx() { _data._re = 0.0; _data._im = 0.0; }
03797       cmplx(float r, float i = 0.0) { _data._re = r; _data._im = i; }
03798       cmplx(cmplx &c) { _data._re = c._data._re;   \
03799                         _data._im = c._data._im; }  //copy constructor
03800       friend inline float sreal(const cmplx& a) { return a._data._re; }
03801       friend inline float simag(const cmplx& a) { return a._data._im; }
03802   };
03803 #endif
